programme.title: StarTalk Things You Thought You Knew
programme.sub-title: StarTalk Things You Thought You Knew Season 4 Mini-Marathon
programme.desc: Science surrounds us every day. Astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson takes you from novice to knowledgeable, detailing how planes fly, what makes a rainbow, why hurricanes form, and the many other fascinating wonders that make up our world.

programme.title: StarTalk with Neil deGrasse Tyson
programme.sub-title: StarTalk with Neil deGrasse Tyson Season 2 Mini-Marathon Pt I
programme.desc: Astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson and an extraordinary lineup of top field experts dive deep into unique realms of science. Join them for thought-provoking discussions about the theories, discoveries, and phenomena that matter most to us all.

programme.title: StarTalk Cosmic Queries
programme.desc: You have questions, they will have answers. Renowned astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson and other top science minds take on fan questions about life and the universe. Uncover a new mind-bending topic each season, from space and physics to nature and more.
